arabic.title: بأمارة ايه
text: بامارة ايه تضيع منّي كل سنيني
بامارة ايه تضيع منّي كل سنيني
صعبت انا فيها في مرة عليك

english.title: By what authority
text: I took a decision ,I am not backing up
why would you be surprised ,I have said it so often
I was patient with you  believed your eyes
By what authority would  my whole life be wasted
In front of me (my eyes) here beside me
What have you done to make me
Some day,regret that I left you and come back
You toughened up and were  harsh towards me
And I ,how often I let it pass by
I wrote so much,yet never complained
But now I have had enough
By what authority would  my whole life be wasted
In front of me (my eyes) here beside me
What have you done to make me
Some day,regret that I left you and come back
Why should I forgive you,can you tell me of  an instance that you once felt sorry for me
I have sobered up ,its too much I will erase all pictures I have taken with you
